full_summary:
### Advance Procurement Notice: Inspection, Testing and Maintenance (ITM) Services for Petroleum Storage Tank Management

#### Description:

This is an advance notice of a procurement opportunity for Inspection, Testing and Maintenance (ITM) services for petroleum storage tank management at 5 Canadian Forces Base Gagetown in Oromocto, New Brunswick.

#### Contract Details:

* Contract Number: GA210051
* Title: Inspection, Testing and Maintenance (ITM) for Petroleum Storage Tank Management, 5 CDSB Gagetown, NB
* Estimated Value: $4,200,000
* Anticipated Posting Date: November 29, 2023

The services required include annual inspections of petroleum storage tanks, annual cleaning and inspection of oil-water separators, and other related work to ensure compliance with federal regulations and promote environmental stewardship.

#### Security Requirements:

To be eligible for contract award, contractors must hold a valid and active Designated Organization Screening (DOS) at the level of Reliability granted or approved by the Contract Security Program (CSP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

#### Sponsorship Process:

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is offering sponsorship under its Industrial Security Program (ISP) to facilitate the security clearance application process for contractors. Contractors can submit a sponsorship request application to DCC, providing details such as their contract number and the level of security clearance requested.

Upon receipt of the sponsorship request application, DCC will review and communicate with the contractor to complete the sponsorship request package. DCC will then forward the package to the CSP, PWGSC on behalf of the contractor, subject to specific timelines.

#### Contact Information:

For questions related to the sponsorship process or this Advance Procurement Notice, please contact Yuriy Klitynskyy at (506) 471-3972 or yuriy.klitynskyy@dcc-cdc.gc.ca.

#### Disclaimer:

DCC does not provide any assurances or guarantees that a sponsorship request package or security clearance application will be successful or result in the granting of the required security clearance. Contractors agree to bear any risks associated with the completeness and accuracy of their application and the timeliness of the security clearance process. 

### Additional Information:

Bidding and documents are available on [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply. See [https://www.merx.com/public/pricing](https://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information. Iceberg Communications #
